claude\_shannon - (14:54): Good afternoon :)  
sburjan - (14:58): hello CalebJamesDeLisl  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (14:58): hi  
sburjan - (14:59): I am running "ImportTest" from ui-tests and I get a null pointer exception on fileURL  
sburjan - (14:59): I have to run the tests in a special way .. because these tests pass on Hudson  
sburjan - (14:59): ?  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (15:00): I haven't looked at ui-tests in a while. Don't know what it could be.  
claude\_shannon left at 15:01 (Ping timeout: 252 seconds  
sburjan - (15:02): sdumitriu, : do you have any idea ?  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (15:03): Nap time for me, see ya later.  
claude\_shannon joined #xwiki at 15:07  
sburjan - (15:20): figured it out  
sburjan - (15:21): but one odd thing is that when I build from eclipse, i get created a target-eclipse directory. And If i have additional resources to load, like files to attach, when runningthe thest from eclipse, it will search in target-eclipse instread of target dir
